title: Augmented Reality-Based Khmer Vocabulary Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Designed for science field practitioners, focusing on practical vocabulary for local collaboration in Thailand.

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate proficiency in over 150 Khmer technical vocabulary items in science fields with over 80% accuracy in an AR-Quest environment
Learners can apply Khmer vocabulary contextually to communicate via augmented reality simulations
Learners achieve at least 70% proficiency in target language use during project-based assessments (on-site scenario role-plays)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
